verbLexeme: 1. To gradually increase, grow or improve, especially after something has previously been damaged. English = build up.
2. To rebuild something that has been destroyed or badly damaged. English = reconstruct.
nominalLexeme: 1. The gradual increase, growth or improvement in something, especially after it had been damaged. English = build up.
2. The rebuilding of something that has been destroyed or badly damaged. English = reconstruction.
